name: Cat Job!
description:
Welcome to Cat job!

How to play:
- Click/Touch screen to move the cat!
- You get 1 Ratcoin for each rat catched!
- You loose if a dog catchs you!

Get enough Ratcoins to unlock new cats!

This simple game was made in Construct 2, you can play it on html5 here

or you can PLAY IT on Android!
